blocks.name: zefldiv2ALTV
blocks.content: The floor of an even number divided by 2 is equal to the even number divided by 2. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jun-2020.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: zofldiv2ALTV
blocks.content: The floor of an odd numer divided by 2 is equal to the odd number first decreased by 1 and then divided by 2. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jun-2020.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  fveq2d(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c0, codd))
  syl(wcel(c0, codd), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcnd(c0, wcel(c0, codd))
  oddz(c0)
  eqtrd(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq1d(c0, cdiv, nat2, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  eqcomd(c0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  npcan1(c0)
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(nat1, cc), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  peano2cnm(c0)
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  2cnne0()
  divdir(co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat1, nat2)
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, codd), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat1)))

  oddm1div2z(c0)

  oveq2d(nat2, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, codd))
